languages.text: Every time the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} is reduced by −5 for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Stacks up to 6 times.
languages.original_text: Каждый раз, когда персонаж наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, показатели {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнего Боя{/g} цели уменьшаются на 5 на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Эффект суммируется до 6 раз.

traits.locale_text: Every time the wearer deals damage, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} is reduced by −5 for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.

Every time the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} is reduced by −5 for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Stacks up to 6 times.

Every time the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} is reduced by −5 for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Stacks up to 6 times.

Every time the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} is reduced by −5 for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Stacks up to 6 times.

languages.text: Каждый раз, когда персонаж наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, показатели {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнего Боя{/g} цели уменьшаются на 5 на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Эффект суммируется до 6 раз.

Wenn der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} verursacht, werden die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} des Ziels 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang um −5 reduziert. Bis zu 6-mal stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Every time the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} is reduced by −5 for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Stacks up to 6 times.

traits.locale_text: Jedes mal wenn der Träger Schaden verursacht, wird die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} des Ziels 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang um -5 reduziert. Addiert sich bis zu 3-mal.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} de la cible sont réduites de −5 pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Cumulable 6 fois.
languages.original_text: Every time the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} is reduced by −5 for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Stacks up to 6 times.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} de la cible sont réduites de −5 pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Cumulable 6 fois.

languages.text: 每当装备者造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，都会使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}降低5点，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。最多叠加6层。
languages.original_text: Every time the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} is reduced by −5 for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Stacks up to 6 times.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者造成伤害时，都会使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}降低5点，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。最多叠加3层。

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador causa {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} del objetivo se reducen en −5 durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Este efecto se acumula un máximo de 6 veces.
languages.original_text: Every time the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} is reduced by −5 for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Stacks up to 6 times.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador causa daño, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} se reducen en −5 durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rondas{/g}. Este efecto se acumula un máximo de 3 veces.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えるたび、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}を−5低下させる。6回までスタック可能。
languages.original_text: Every time the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} is reduced by −5 for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Stacks up to 6 times.

traits.locale_text: 使用者がダメージを与えるたび、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g}を5低下させる。3回までスタック可能。

languages.text: Giyen kişi her {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verdiğinde, hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} ile {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} nitelikleri 5'er puan azaltır. Etkisi 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. 6 kez üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: Every time the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} is reduced by −5 for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Stacks up to 6 times.
